Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards scored 32 points with seven 3-pointers
Zion Williamson had 22 points, six rebounds, four assists, three steals and a block in 27 minutes
Miscellaneous Highlights: Former Pelican Julius Randle scored 16 points
Ex-LSU star Naz Reid had 13 points and 12 rebounds for Minnesota
Rudy Gobert had 14 rebounds and six blocks
Others: Donte DiVincenzo started at point guard for a second straight night in place of Mike Conley
Williamson and Murray worked well together in the first Pelicans game this season with both in the lineup
